snippet: A treatment pulled off the market 30 years ago has won Food and Drug Administration approval again as the only drug designated to treat morning sickness.
abstract: Treatment pulled off market 30 years ago wins Food and Drug Administration approval again as only drug designated to treat morning sickness; drug once called Bendectin is set to return to American pharmacies under name Diclegis.
lead_paragraph: A treatment pulled off the market 30 years ago has won Food and Drug Administration approval again as the only drug designated to treat morning sickness.
